name: Amrit Mahotsav: Ek Unmukt Yatra (Walk Event, Male)
description:
Hello all,

Hello all,
The Adventure Sports Club of IIT Kanpur brings to you Amritmahotsav: Ek Unmukt Yatra, an event covered under the Government of India initiative, Azadi ka Amrit Mahotsav to commemorate 75 years of independence of India.

It is a run or walk event, where each participant will be expected to cover a distance of 75 km through walking over 18 days. The event starts on 29th July with an offline kick-off run, where all participants will run together.
We would like to thank our sponsor NH91, Grand CT, ChinaTown, Forest 91 Club for supporting us conducting this event.
